--- In junit@y..., "Dale E Martin" <dmartin@c...> wrote:
> > This is something else I get asked for all the time.  Sure would 
be nice
> > if someone coded all this up...
> 
> What are you looking for?  I'll be writing an assert that compares 
two
> files in the next day or two.  If this is all you're looking for, I 
can
> contribute it if you like.
> 
> Later,
> 	Dale

Yup,

The simplest thing would be to code it up, include the url to the 
diff library, and upload it to the files/src section.  You could do 
something like Alex did with the string patch if you want to get more 
complicated. (http://www.purpletech.com/junit-patch/index.jsp)

Erik Meade
